News.headline: Daggers vs. Wealdstone FA Cup Hospitality Special
News.page_title: Daggers vs. Wealdstone FA Cup Hospitality Special
News.URL_keywords: Daggers vs. Wealdstone FA Cup Hospitality Special
News.short_description: Hospitality Special For Home and Away Fans For Our FA Cup Match Against Wealdstone
News.description:
Watch the Daggers in style this month with a special on hospitality packages for our FA Cup 4th Round Qualifying fixture against Wealdstone on Saturday 15th October reduced to just £30.00 for adults and £25.00 for concessions (usually £65.00).

A massive saving is on offer for any fans wanting to watch the Daggers in style this October. The matchday hospitality package includes the following:

·Three course carvery meal
·Complimentary match day programme and team sheet
·Half time refreshments
·Seat in the sponsors box

The game kicks off at 3.00pm with lunch served from 1pm

For more information or to make a booking please contact the clubs commercial department on commercial@daggers.co.uk or call 0208 592 1549 Ext. 33.
